name: PHLivePhotoView
desc: A view that displays a Live Photo—a picture that also includes motion and sound from the moments just before and after its capture.

items.name: var livePhoto: PHLivePhoto?
items.desc: The Live Photo displayed in the view.

items.name: var playbackGestureRecognizer: UIGestureRecognizer
items.desc: A gesture recognizer that controls playback of the Live Photo in the view.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the view plays the audio content of its Live Photo.

items.name: var audioVolume: Float
items.desc: The audio gain to apply to the Live Photo’s movie content during playback.

items.name: var delegate: PHLivePhotoViewDelegate?
items.desc: An object to be notified when Live Photo playback begins or ends.

items.name: protocol PHLivePhotoViewDelegate
items.desc: The PHLivePhotoViewDelegate protocol describes messages sent by a PHLivePhotoView instance in response to playback events when playing the motion and sound content associated with a Live Photo. To receive these messages, implement the methods in this protocol in one of your controller objects and assign that object to the delegate property of a Live Photo view.

items.name: func startPlayback(with: PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle)
items.desc: Begins playback of Live Photo content in the view.

items.name: func stopPlayback()
items.desc: Stops playback of a Live Photo.

items.name: func stopPlayback(animated: Bool)
items.desc: Stops playback of a Live Photo in an animated manner.

items.name: class func livePhotoBadgeImage(options: PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions) -> UIImage
items.desc: Returns an icon image for the specified Live Photo semantic options.

items.name: var livePhotoBadgeView: NSView?
items.desc: A view for displaying Live Photo status.

items.name: var contentMode: PHLivePhotoViewContentMode
items.desc: The mode in which the view displays its content.

items.name: enum PHLivePhotoViewContentMode
items.desc: The enumerated Live Photo content modes.

items.name: enum PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle
items.desc: Options for how much of the motion and sound content of a Live Photo to play, used in the startPlayback(with:) method and in messages to the view’s delegate object.

items.name: struct PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions
items.desc: Options for the semantic use and display style of icons for badging Live Photo assets, used by the livePhotoBadgeImage(options:) method.
